Package de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.overlay.dht.centralized

A proof-of-concept example DHT implementation based on a central server.

Class Summary
CentralizedTest The concrete subclass should select an implementation of the email system through decision which Server and Client to use.

SimpleDHTObject  
 

Package de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.overlay.dht.centralized Description

A proof-of-concept example DHT implementation based on a central server. Actually, this is not a real DHT, as it uses one central node (server) which stores all the data.
